metadata.name: Art is the Utility NFT
metadata.description:
"Art is a celebration of the human spirit, a timeless expression of our feelings, dreams, senses, and emotions. From the earliest cave paintings to the newest digital masterpieces, art has always been a way to connect, tell stories, share ideas, and experience the world in new and meaningful ways. 

Today, with the rise of NFTs and the growth of the art market, we have a unique opportunity to connect artists, collectors & the art industry. 

By embracing the power of creativity, we can celebrate the rich history of art, while also looking forward to a bright future filled with new discoveries, new emotions, and new ways of experiencing our existences! 

Art is truly the utility that brings us all together! A language that transcends time and space, and a powerful tool for making sense of the world around us."
